column1: "Regarding your Recent Credit Card Application","We are writing to you regarding your recent credit card application. We have received your application and are currently reviewing all of your details, including your credit history and personal information. This process is essential to ensure that we can provide you with the most suitable financial products. We will notify you of the status of your application via email within the next 3-5 business days. You can also check the status of your application at any time by logging into our secure application portal using the reference number provided in this email. Thank you for your patience, and we look forward to potentially welcoming you as a new cardholder."
